events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me well and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message was reviewed and the issue was categorised as a refund request due to product dissatisfaction and size problem.
An available customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer regarding next steps.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for the jacket you purchased. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund swiftly.
My order number is 4532178. The jacket is brand new; I haven’t worn or washed it. I’m ready to send it back once you give me instructions.
Thank you for the information. Please use the prepaid return label attached in this email to send back the jacket within 14 days, and once received, we will process your refund immediately.
Thanks for the quick reply and the prepaid label. I appreciate how fast you are helping me with this refund process.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed to your original payment method. Please allow up to 5 business days for it to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for reaching out and we hope to serve you better in the future.
